channel.title: Shops and Dialogue in 508
channel.description:
Sorry for posting this twice. My other thread was buried somewhere around page 5.
Anyway, it's been a while since I last worked with RS private servers, and it was some older sources.
Anyway, I'm wondering what I need to do to get dialogue and shops working in 508. I know this was previously possible, (in 317 or something) but I don't see anything in Palidino76's source that might help with this.
I'm also wondering how I might go about handling for events, such as clicking to attack an NPC.
Thanks!

item.title: Shops and Dialogue in 508
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Theres a list on Moparscape or Rune-Server for a list of 508 Tutorials. I’ve seen a dialogue one there, I’m almost positive.

Read full topic
